Text:
I am trying to use this `href="tel:8665487349"` in a Web application which is responsive, when the page is on mobile, iOS works properly but on Android I am getting an issue, the pop-up is not present. It goes directly to dial the number. This is the whole component

Or call to apply by phone

PS: I added the JavaScript tag to the question because there could be possible solutions using JavaScript.

I am trying to use this `href="tel:8665487349"` in a Web application which is responsive, when the page is on mobile, iOS works properly but on Android I am getting an issue, the pop-up is not present. It goes directly to dial the number. This is the whole component

Or call to apply by phone

By pop-up I mean: pop-up is the one when you click on a phone number in your screen so the OS ask you if you really want to call or no? its like: `Call | Cancel` that is the one that is not showing up. PS: I added the JavaScript tag to the question because there could be possible solutions using JavaScript.

By pop-up I mean: pop-up is the one when you click on a phone number in your screen so the OS ask you if you really want to call or no? its like: `Call | Cancel` that is the one that is not showing up. This is what appears when you click on the phone number: [![enter image description here][1]][1] PS: I added the JavaScript tag to the question because there could be possible solutions using JavaScript.
